Mr. Charter Heslep, Chief
Radio-Television Branch
Atomic Energy Commission
Washington 25, D. C.
Dear Mr. Heslep:
This will acknowledge receipt of your communication dated
February twelfth requesting permission to reâ€”record the
programs over WLS entitled "School Time" for distribution
to school systems and for use over non-commercial school
broadcast facilities.
Kindly be advised that the American Federation of Musicians
will have no objection to this request, providing it is used
only for the purposes described in your letter and will not
be commercially sponsored.
Very truly yours.
James C. Petrillo (signed)
President
